original_text: When I have done all that to them, I will not be angry any longer. I will not punish them any more, because it is enough. When I have finished, they will know that I, the Lord, have spoken to them. I have been angry with them because they have not been faithful to me.
korean_text: 이와 같이 내 노가 다한즉 그들을 향한 분이 풀려서 내 마음이 가라앉으리라 내 분이 그들에게 다한즉 나 여호와가 열심으로 말한 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.original_text: When I have done all that to them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 그 모든 것을 행했을 때

sentences.original_text: I will not be angry any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 분노하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will not punish them any more
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 더 이상 그들을 벌하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: they will know that I, the Lord, have spoken to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나 주께서 그들에게 말씀하셨음을 알 것이다

sentences.original_text: I have been angry with them
because they have not been faithful to me
